name: Guilds Of Delenar
description: Guilds of Delenar is a strategy RPG with a tactical turn-based combat system where you fight to build your guild from nothing into a guild known across the realm. Manage your heroes, their gear, what quests you do, and command them in battle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2200k i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated HD5000 Additional Notes: direct X 10.1
